parameters.name: All
parameters.description: Whether to delete all tags of the target resource. This field takes effect only when TagKey.N is left empty. Default False

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The list of resource IDs. Valid values of N: 1 to 50.

parameters.name: ResourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the resource. Valid values:

*   Job
*   Executor

parameters.name: TagKey
parameters.description: The list of tag keys, which can contain a maximum of 20 child items.
